contextId.occurrenceNote: Possible meanings are 1) Hezekiah strengthened his position by commanding the people to repair the walls of the city. You can make this clear by using the connecting word "by." Alternate translation: "Hezekiah strengthened the city by building up" or 2) he became encouraged. Alternate translation: "Hezekiah became encouraged and built up" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/writing-connectingwords]])
contextId.glQuote: Hezekiah took courage and built up
